Meteara faces the Earth again. She looks at it as if it contained a 
plague and that it needed to be quarantined.

Meteara: You have done what I have asked of you, Cybertronian Firaxis. 
You can leave now. If we see each other again, one of us will have to 
die.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>      He stands up and walks away.  When he gets to his ship he opens 
a wide-band frequency to the planet.  "This is Firaxis again.  I just 
finished speaking with a kind lady who says she was sent by the Vok.  
She says she'll kill us all if you destroy another "sphere" whatever 
that is."  He sighs and turns off the com.  He walks back over to 
Meteara.  "I sent your message but I doubt anyone will notice."
